statements: SELECT * FROM financial_reports;
SELECT category, amount FROM financial_reports WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, category, amount, transaction_date FROM financial_reports WHERE category = 'Income';
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_reports GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE category = 'Income' ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_reports GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE category LIKE 'Expense%' ORDER BY category ASC, amount DESC
SELECT category, COUNT(id) AS total_transactions FROM financial_reports GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(id) > 1 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC
SELECT * FROM income ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT amount, source FROM income WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT id, amount FROM income WHERE source = 'Salary' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, amount FROM expenses WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM income WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT source, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM income GROUP BY source HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT date, SUM(amount) AS total_income FROM income GROUP BY date ORDER BY total_income DESC;
SELECT category, AVG(amount) AS avg_expense FROM expenses GROUP BY category HAVING avg_expense > 500;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT ID, Date, Amount, Description FROM Income;
SELECT Description, Amount FROM Expenses WHERE Amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Savings WHERE Date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT Amount, Description FROM Income ORDER BY Amount DESC;
SELECT ID, Description FROM Expenses ORDER BY Date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Income WHERE Amount > 1000 ORDER BY Date DESC
SELECT Amount, Description FROM Expenses WHERE Date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT ID, Date, Description FROM Savings WHERE Amount < 500 ORDER BY Date ASC
SELECT Date, SUM(Amount) AS Total_Income FROM Income GROUP BY Date HAVING Total_Income > 5000
SELECT * FROM Expenses WHERE Description LIKE '%Groceries%'
SELECT * FROM income;
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT source, amount FROM income WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT category FROM expenses WHERE category='Groceries';
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_income, total_expenses, total_savings FROM financial_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM income;
SELECT source, amount FROM income ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM savings WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT category, amount FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT report_date, total_income, total_expenses FROM financial_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM income_reports;
SELECT report_name, total_income FROM income_reports ORDER BY total_income DESC;
SELECT report_name, total_savings FROM savings_reports WHERE total_savings > 5000;
SELECT report_name, total_expenses FROM expense_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM expense_details WHERE category = 'Utilities';
SELECT * FROM income_reports WHERE total_income > 5000 ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_name, total_income FROM income_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT report_name, total_savings FROM savings_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-04-01' ORDER BY total_savings DESC
SELECT source, amount FROM income_details WHERE amount >= 1000 AND source LIKE '%Salary%'
SELECT category, amount FROM expense_details WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY category ASC
